biotools.summary: scAnt is an open-source, low-cost macro 3D scanner, designed to automate the creation of digital 3D models of insects of various sizes in full colour. scAnt provides example configurations for the scanning process, as well as scripts for stacking and masking of images to prepare them for the photogrammetry software of your choice.

bioschemas.name: scAnt
